All Star Cheer

All Star Cheer Squad

ENROLL IN THIS CLASS

Whether your child is a novice cheerleader or interested in advancing her skills to the next level, whether she has been cheering for years, or is just starting out, this is the perfect opportunity to take her cheerleading skills to a whole new level!!


Junior Varsity (ages 3-5)


Varsity (ages 6-12)


Schools can choose Center-Wide or Elective Enrichment Classes. Programs run year-round or as 8 or 12-week clinics!


Our Dancing Stars Ballet Program automatically merges with All-Star Cheer during the summer months.


Last year more than 3.5 million students participated in Cheerleading (Nat’l Cheerleading Assn.). Join the national trend and sign your child up today!

  • Offered:Seasonal
  • Ages:3-12 Years
  • Class time:30-60 min
  • Qualified Youth Fitness Coach

Highlights of All Star Cheer

  • We upgrade our cheer program every year
  • Arm Motion and Jump Technique and Terminology with all new drills to reinforce and refine technique
  • Spirit Dances & Bleacher-Mania
  • Cheers & Chants
  • Basic Stunting Skills
  • Pep Rally Performance
  • Basic tumbling skills

Fitness Stars 5 Points Of Success

  • Fun, age Age-appropriate exercises
  • Future sports and school readiness
  • FUNtastic theme curriculum kids love
  • Focus on emotional intelligence
  • Formal communications with email and social media

Teach children how they should live, and they will remember it all their life. – Proverbs 22:6

About Stretch-n-Grow

Stretch -n- Grow is the world’s largest network of certified youth fitness instructors providing fun & engaging enrichment programs that get kids moving at their schools.

We specialize in high quality, FUN exercise experiences that get kids moving, including: Fitness, Dance, Gymnastics, Sports, Music and Yoga.

​ What started as a dream to get kids more active and physically fit expanded into building Stretch- N-Grow. Kendra Urban has been a Stretch-n-Grow owner since 2006, having served hundreds of thousands of families over the years.

We serve Southlake, Colleyville, North Richland Hills, Keller, Downtown, Central & NW Fort Worth, Weatherford, Southern DFW, & Ellis County.
